name: Base or counterfeit coin
description: Base or counterfeit currency and coins
legal_reference: Customs Management and Duties Act 2010, Schedule 8, Part I(a)

name: Controlled drugs
description: Controlled drugs as scheduled in the Drugs (Prevention of Misuse) Act (Cap. 178)
legal_reference: Customs Management and Duties Act 2010, Schedule 8, Part I(b); Drugs (Prevention of Misuse) Act Cap. 178

name: Goods prohibited by other laws
description: Goods of which the import or export is prohibited or made an offence by any other law
legal_reference: Customs Management and Duties Act 2010, Schedule 8, Part I(c)

name: Prohibited plants
description: Plants whose importation is prohibited under the Plant Protection Act (Cap. 93), and any subsidiary legislation made under that Act
legal_reference: Customs Management and Duties Act 2010, Schedule 8, Part I(d); Plant Protection Act Cap. 93
